com.musicplayer.player

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VLCJBufferedPlayer, VLCJDuoPlayer, VLCJListPlayer, VLCJSinglePlayer

    public interface Player
    Defines the minimum framework to implement a player to be a drop-in replacement in Main. see VLCJListPlayer for an example of implementation and detail about each function

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      static int DEFAULT_INCR

      static int MIN_VOLUME

      Set the volume to a precise int, between the minimum and maximum set in the class constants.

      Set the amount by which the volume is modified Affects volumeUp() and volumeDown()

      default void volumeDown()
      Decrement the volume by a certain value Available through getVolumeIncrement Edit it through setVolumeIncrement
      default void volumeUp()
      Increment the volume by a certain value Available through getVolumeIncrement() Edit it through setVolumeIncrement

      • add

        void add(java.lang.String song)
        Add a single song to the queue (using it's path) (can technically be done after starting playing)
        Parameters:

      • addMultiple

        void addMultiple(java.util.List<java.lang.String> songs)
        Add multiple songs to the queue (using their path) (can technically be done after starting playing)
        Parameters:
        songs: - arraylist of paths to the audio files

      • play

        void play()
        Start playing the list (will loop at the end)

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause playback

      • next

        void next()
        Jump to song after current one in the queue. If playback is paused, resume.

      • previous

        void previous()
        Jump to song before the current one in the queue. If playback is paused, resume.

      • stop

        void stop()

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(int volume)
        Set the volume to a precise int, between the minimum and maximum set in the class constants.

        Checks if playback is paused Useful if you want to have only one play/pause button

      • volumeDown

        default void volumeDown()
        Decrement the volume by a certain value Available through getVolumeIncrement Edit it through setVolumeIncrement

      • volumeUp

        default void volumeUp()
        Increment the volume by a certain value Available through getVolumeIncrement() Edit it through setVolumeIncrement
